features.featureTitle: Update `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` so the "Next Step to Execute" section advances from Step 9.5 (Rollout 21.7 Build/Upgrade Execution) to Step 10 (Deployment and Launch), using clear English instructions and referencing any relevant existing checklists/log templates where appropriate.

Create a new Step 10 post-deployment smoke-test checklist document (Markdown) that can be used to validate the deployed app on mainnet/production, covering: landing page load (`/`), authentication/portal access (AuthGate + ApprovalGate), all five portal detail routes, and opening the "Edit Links" dialog on each detail page for both an Admin user and a non-admin approved Member user.
